review: Works great, easy setup. Easy navigation and control with a smart device such as phone or tablet. NO lag or stutter.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I like this device. I use it almost daily to watch Netflix and U Tube on my television instead of my tablet or cellphone. It is easy to install and a snap to connect from tablet to television.
author: Edmund F. Spencer

review: so slow, full screen mode is far from good.streaming from device is super slow.

review: Works well, easy to install.  Just remember it only projects wireless images that come through Google.  Computer content not on Google is not accessable.
author: M. Newton

review: I got this for my parents shortly after convincing them to try a Google Music account; it's a third of the price of Apple TV and for their purposes, it's doing 100% of the things they were doing with their Apple TV.
author: J Hunt

review: Where have you been all my life.  Easy to setup and use with a Chrome browser.  But I purchased for using with my Android phone and it works better than I hoped. I can use my phone and this device to be my portable DVR video player anywhere I want to go (that has WiFi).
author: PilotSteven

review: It's everything I expected. I have 2 of them. To be able to take this little piece of hardware and attach it to a tv and end up with a smart tv versus buying a smart tv.....what a great idea and it saved me a lot of money, that's why I purchased 2.
